[Switzerland](/wiki/Swiss_order_of_precedence) [Thailand](/wiki/Thai_order_of_precedence) [Turkey](/wiki/Turkish_order_of_precedence) [United Kingdom](/wiki/Orders_of_precedence_in_the_United_Kingdom) [England and Wales](/wiki/Order_of_precedence_in_England_and_Wales) [Scotland](/wiki/Order_of_precedence_in_Scotland) [United States](/wiki/United_States_order_of_precedence) - v - t - e The **Singapore order of precedence** is a nominal and symbolic hierarchy of important positions within the [Government of Singapore](/wiki/Government_of_Singapore). It has no legal standing but is used to dictate ceremonial protocol at events of a national nature. The official list was gazetted in 1967. ## Order of precedence RankPositionName**1**President[Tharman Shanmugaratnam](/wiki/Tharman_Shanmugaratnam)**2**Prime Minister[Lawrence Wong](/wiki/Lawrence_Wong)**3**Former [Prime Minister](/wiki/Prime_Minister_of_Singapore) [Senior Minister](/wiki/Senior_Minister_of_Singapore) [Lee Hsien Loong](/wiki/Lee_Hsien_Loong)**4**[Deputy Prime Minister](/wiki/Deputy_Prime_Minister_of_Singapore)[Gan Kim Yong](/wiki/Gan_Kim_Yong)**5**[Chief Justice](/wiki/Chief_Justice_of_Singapore)[Sundaresh Menon](/wiki/Sundaresh_Menon)**6**[Speaker of Parliament](/wiki/Speaker_of_the_Parliament_of_Singapore)[Seah Kian Peng](/wiki/Seah_Kian_Peng)**7**Former [Presidents](/wiki/President_of_Singapore)[Tony Tan](/wiki/Tony_Tan) [Halimah Yacob](/wiki/Halimah_Yacob) **8**Former [Prime Minister](/wiki/Prime_Minister_of_Singapore)[Goh Chok Tong](/wiki/Goh_Chok_Tong)**9**[Cabinet Ministers](/wiki/Cabinet_of_Singapore)*see here***9A**Senior Ministers of State*see here***9B**Ministers of State*see here***9C**Senior Parliamentary Secretaries*see here***10**Foreign High Commissioners and Ambassadors to Singapore*see here***10A**Singapore High Commissioners and Ambassadors*see here***10B***[Chargés d'affaires](/wiki/Charg%C3%A9_d%27affaires)**see here***11**Awardees of the [Order of Temasek](/wiki/Darjah_Utama_Temasek)**12**[Attorney-General](/wiki/Attorney-General_of_Singapore)[Lucien Wong](/wiki/Lucien_Wong)**13**Chairman of the [Public Service Commission](/wiki/Public_Service_Commission_(Singapore))[Lee Tzu Yang](/wiki/Lee_Tzu_Yang)**14**[Supreme Court](/wiki/Supreme_Court_of_Singapore) Judges*see here***14A**[State Court](/wiki/State_Courts_of_Singapore) Judges*see here***15**Deputy [Speaker of Parliament](/wiki/Speaker_of_the_Parliament_of_Singapore)*see here***16**Parliamentary Secretaries*see here***17**[Members of Parliament](/wiki/Parliament_of_Singapore)*see here*
title: Singapore order of precedence
